reviews.review_text: The restaurant is really at a great location plus the ambience is perfect. Not just Indians but everyone would love the food here as it has many varieties. I tried buffet and it costed me 25 bucks which was alright. Try this restaurant if you crave Indian home style authentic dishes.
YUM. Love this place. I go often. One of the only buffers I can find in vancouver area. Does not disappoint. So many yummy options to choose from. Cool bar, great music.

Just exploring restaurants around granville broadway area. I wouldn t say my experience was so good here. We thought we arrived there at wrong time. It was around 10pm and they rushed us to order food and drinks. Only good thing was our server. Guy worked really hard and he was the only one on the floor. We ordered rose lassi and margrita. Drinks were great but obviously it took some time to arrive on our table since there was only one guy to do all the tasks. Five stars only for him and i dont want to affect your restaurant ratings. I didnt get a chance to catch his name but if you are reading this.. you are doing a great job. U saved 4 stars for your restaurant otherwise i would have given only one star for food.

Huge dining space inside, which you would wonder exists when looked from outside. Nice patio during the summer but with the construction site, you would want to stay inside. First time in Vancouver I experienced the all you can eat for a fixed price. Huge variety of Indian food and few Chinese food as well. CAD 26 with Tax and you can eat as you wish from the buffet. Lovely to see how the staff refills the buffet with closely paying attention. Taste level is 8/10..  Value for money 10/10

The food in the buffet was plentiful and fresh  everything I tried was very flavourful and satisfying. The waiters were attentive and cleared the plates right away and were quite friendly. It s been years since I have been here and glad to see it is still around and still amazing. Great value for all the things that are available.

Delicious food! We went for the buffet and I would 100% recommended. A lot of vegetarian options but there is meat as well and it s very tasty. I believe they have the best naan bread. Nice staff too. Will be coming back :)

The food was warm, delicious and tasty with excellent presentation. Ambience was relaxing with the right background music. High quality furniture and clean environment. Overall score is excellent and wifey and I had to come back the following day to repeat the same experience. Vegetarian options: There are many options and you are sure to get something that is right for you. Kid-friendliness: Safe environment for kids with meal options

Very impressive casual Indian dining. Five stars not because its the best Indian food out there but definitely delicious  above average especially for buffet food. The made to order is probably even better but I tasted the buffet. Huge selection including fresh salad bar which is always great. Literally 40 - 60 dishes so you can have a taste of many. Happy hour 3-6 has wine at $5 and beer @ $4  Happy hour or not good value for your buck. Clean, plain atmosphere. Service was good. Outside patio if you want fresh air. Help the businesses on Broadway during this construction. The dinner will feel even better. Highly recommend.

Had not been in a while.Didnt disappoint! Food was excellent, fresh and hot. the staff made sure it was full and kept tidy. Service was fine and the atmosphere is always nice. Washrooms were very clean too. Food

Good service, good food (Buffet!), and good price! They have lots of vegetarian options as well. Chai tea, juice, fruits, salad, curries, various types of rice - all you can eat! Its like my little heaven They have a huuuuge & easy parking lot as well (access from 8th and then its located on Laurel st! Due to construction)

Food was good, everyone was kind and easy going. Usually some places the service is trash but this restaurant treated me well. The food was tasty and I liked how the food wasn t to spicy. Overall great experience.

Fantastic food with an extremely large selection of items. I was amazed by the place from the very moment I walked in. A very lively atmosphere with a chic kind of ambience and a spacious seating area. The buffet table is right at the center and the choices available are massive. Usually people tend to mess up when the selection is this big but not this place. Each curry was finger licking good and tasted amazing. The only downside I felt was that the chicken felt slightly harder to chew probably coz it wasnt the freshest but the taste of the curry more than made up for it. The taste is genuine Indian and the staff is super polite and helpful. 10/10 will recommend.
$30, more than I typically pay for a buffet but Im not in Vancouver much. Solid prices on beer. Friendly staff. Delicious deserts too. Kind of a pub in India vibe. Local hang out.

I was on vacation in Vancouver and decided to eat there. I was walking by the  restaurant which caught my eye. Love this place! So many choices on the buffet. So delicious! Our server was fantastic, smiling and helpful.
Great food and prices too! Service was very kind. My only gripe was the obnoxiously loud and unfitting music, but since there werent many people, they lowered the volume when we kindly asked.

As a Chinese I really like Indian Curry Naan and Indian rice.Therestaurant has a good price. I had so much. Butter chicken is my favorite.The staff is kindly and care about me about their taste. I have to say I like it.I must come back soon.

Im came from toronto and just walking around the restaurant and me and my friends visited here and we are amazed by the test of the restaurant. Everything is perfect with customer service. I would recommend my toronto friends to visiting this place when they will here in Vancouver.Great experience.One of the best Restaurant I ever Visited in the Vancouver. Vegetarian options: Everything in the buffet was mouth watering. I don t have words to describe anything

They have good food with good ambiance. I love the fact that they have Chai   and one of the best Gulab jamuns(a dessert) I have ever had in Vancouver. The previous comments were 2 months ago and yet I am here and seeing that the food is still good and they have kept the same level of service. I am glad that we tried this restaurant for authentic Indian food. Parking: Located in the basement of the restaurant, pretty easily accessible.

The made to order Lamb Biryani and Beef Biranyi are absolutely extraordinary. I have had biryanis from coast to coast to coast and as a restauranteur myself, I can see how much work goes into this product. The flavor, the packaging, spice level, sizes of meat, longest grain basmati rice, actual chunks of ginger and spices - at 11pm at night on a snowy Monday - this place absolutely blew my socks off. What a pleasant surprise. What a dinner. This may well be the very best Biryani that is possible to make in Canada. It will cater to any taste bud. Nothing but best wishes and compliments to this place. Keep up the great work, highly recommended and will definitely come again.  (The picture doesn t do it justice, that s on me, please try them out)

Great choices!  Supposedly, it is the biggest Indian buffet in North America.  They have goat and lamb, which I enjoy.  Who doesnt like all you can eat, naan?  Buffet food is buffet good! There is a lot to eat but not spectacular.  The price is right, too. Vegetarian options: There is a lot for vegetarian!
Im a Tour Manager and I keep coming to this restaurant all the tine... This restaurant is amazing in every sense. Excellent food, Great ambience and Super service. Highly Recommend. Food : 5/5 |

I believe this place was the same one down the street closer to Cambie. Regardless, this place is great! Really great food and truly a real buffet with variety!! Service was efficient and staff are friendly. High ceilings, lots of seating - comfy seats (place used to be Earles - so think that type of setting/decor). Parking underground - free but limited. Alternatively lots of street parking. Give it a try, you won t regret!
Very typical Indian buffet, they have lamb curry and lots of chicken. Onion ring was also tasty. Maybe lunch is even better value if food is the same?

Today I came with my friends and it was Amazing experience! Had a fantastic time at lunch last week. Presentation and food were great. Each dish came out at the perfect time and an explanation was given for each one, staff were great throughout the meal. Food : 5/5

My fiance and I celebrated our anniversary here and it was great! The buffet is all you can eat, the food was delicious, the price was only $19/person, you got a new plate with each meal, the view of the Vancouver skyline was spectacular, free underground parking, the staff was very nice. I loved it and will go back!

The food is delicious, definitely is an amazing buffet. The place is super clean, the staff is great. You have tons of options to choose from. The dishes are label and you have enough space to move is not a tight place and you can enjoy the time while you eat, the staff is always checking on hou to take off the dirty dishes. I highly recommend it!
Really glad this place existe ! People was nice   don t expect too much of the food   open your  heart and smile   life is beautiful
Great food there! And very nice atmosphere as well! Definitely worth trying out by yourself or with a group of friends!
Amazing Indian Buffet with over 70 items!  Delicious Butter Chicken!  Tons of vegetarian options.  Fruits and desserts.  Fully licensed.  Highly recommended!
Great as   always was here yesterday on valentines day  night for dinner
This is one of the best Indian Restaurants in Vancouver. Never really seen a vast buffet like this. So many delicacies to choose from. Its a must try.

EDIT: Lowering to 1 star momentarily since I havent seen a y response from management. In 1 week Ill raise this again to a fair review. EDIT 2: Updated to 5 stars because I cant help but love this place. Im going to start by saying that Im only leaving this a 3-star review to hopefully get the attention of management. Ill change the review to 5 stars in the near future. This place is amazing. The service is awesome, and the food was incredible. Note: was. I have been ordering from New India as my regular takeout place for at least a year now. I have been ordering the same thing every time: 2 lunchboxes, 1 veg, 1 non-veg. Every single week. Its gotten to the point where the staff recognizes me by name and knows my order. Like I said, great service. The value is incredible, and the food has been top-notch. My girlfriend (from India) has said that this is the best Chana Masala she has ever had in her life. Now to the reason for my review. They recently changed something, within the past month or so. New chef, new recipes, Im not really sure, but the taste has completely changed. The chana has much less flavour and tastes watery, the butter chicken tastes plain, and this goes for a lot of the curries that we were eating with the thali. Its truly a shame, because I loved the atmosphere and the service in this establishment, and I looked forward to the treat of Friday night takeout from New India. With this change Im not sure if Ill continue. Ive been actively looking for a new takeout spot, but what Id love most is for New India to return to their original flavors.

My husband and I went to enjoy dinner. I am not Indian but I am crazy about Indian food. It had a variety of different dishes and deserts. Very good price .well behaved staff and lovely atmosphere. I really liked everything. For sure will go again.

Amazing food...I tried so many things that I am not capable of recommending any....THEY WERE ALL AMAZING DELICIOUS YOU DONT EXPECT THE FOOD AT A BUFFET TO BE SO TASTY AND FRESH BUT I WOULD OF THOUGHT I ORDERED EACH SELECTION 100% RECOMMENDING
Huge restaurant with an all you can eat buffet. The curries are delicious (and spicy) and they have a great amount of vegan options. Love this place!
You will get every indian cuisine and dessert just name and you will find it here.  Amazing food, Amazing service
Very authentic. Great food. Lots of variety. Vegetarian and gluten free friendly. What a hidden gem! Vegetarian options: Too many to list in all.

It is almost a crime how many times Ive been coming here and have yet to leave a review! FOOD: This is a buffet which is all-you-can-eat offering a nice selection of curry and side-dishes. There were plenty of vegetarian dishes as well, with around 50% of the choices in the back being suitable for vegetarians. There is only one choice of rice but other sides such as naan give a good variety of dips to accompany the curry. DRINK: Since I always gorge myself, Ive never ordered a lot of special drink such as the chai tea or mango beverage they offer but the cucumber water provided in the buffet is cool and refreshing after eating a lot of the spicy curry. INTERIOR: I am always tempted to take a nap inside because of the dim lighting and comfortable couches! This is definitely a place that is welcoming to sit for extended periods of time and I would definitely bring a dinner or lunch party here for impressing others. There are sports constantly playing on the TV, and the restaurant would do some special events during holidays or sporting events. SERVICE: Always friendly and attentive. If a food needs freshening up because its been sitting too long, someone runs out of water or plates need cleaning up, the staff come without anyone flagging them down. The restaurant is always tidy, a testament to how well they clean the place.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you lan for sharing your experience. New India management

reviews.review_text: The ambience at this place is really nice....The food is reallly nice...Raghav Bhatia is the best at his work. Super polite and knows great customer service.
Worth every cent. Good place to take your family for Indian buffet

Real heros, the buffet is cheap and a lot of food to eat. It is amazing. The 1+1 food is helping the people fight inflation and eat good. Real pride   of a nation. I salute you  . Just a big fan, eaten your 1+1 daal on difficult nights. You are all that is my INDIA is about. I love   you guys. Food is amaaaazinggg
Great food and service. Server @Raghavbhaitia was really fun. It was a great experience there! Must visit:)

Having been to almost to every Indian restraunt in all of Surrey, Vancouver, I would say I was very impressed by the setup and positioning of this fine eatery. Being in the area I accidentally stopped in here. Abundance of items in the buffet and all very true and tasty! Only thing is the naans need to be a little more softer. I understand this could be due to them sitting in the warmer a bit longer. Best of all they have free parking in the core of the city!  I will definitely be back again!! Parking: Underground,, Get here in time to get your spot!
Good and affordable buffet. However I would like to see them add a bit more variety
Good food and service. Raghav served us and he was sweet and welcoming. Recommend 10/10
Great atmosphere with good team and treat very well. Mist recommended to other. Must visit
Been going here for years! Always eat lamb and butter chicken! Its the best and always fresh
Everything is simply perfect about this place. Highly suggested. Also, The perfect menu, reasonable price, and quality are as expected.
I have been coming to this spot for a very long time , it never disappoints , Food is fresh and tastes rich , staff are friendly and welcoming

Its an excellent buffet at a fair price. Theres a huge choice of items for both meat eaters and vegetarians. I wish I had a bigger stomach because I wanted to go back for seconds on some of my favorites but I was full from trying a huge variety of different items once. Theres a nice choice if desserts too. There was Asahi beer on special for a mere $4. The atmosphere is nice. They have booths for 2 people which individuals and couples like.  Service was friendly.  So I have no complaints. Ill be back.

We went here for the dinner buffet. The service is friendly, you just will have to ask for most things. The food was really good. I would definitely come back. Loved the fresh naan we had! Lots of selection as well.
There should be a sixth star for this place. Just absolutly delicious. I cant wait to go back again!

This was my first visit since they moved from Willow St. The food is excellent as it was before. The view may not be as nice but I go there for the food. A bit pricy but you get what you pay for. Very big selection. Keep up the good work people.
Its good and tasty, nice friendly staff Lots of choices. But the samosas are a little bit oily Food
I love the food here. It s the best quality and taste. The all you can eat buffet is perfect. I recommend coming here with friends and family.
Raghav bhatia gives top notch service. He try his level best in giving best customer experience
Probably the best samoas I ve I had. Always made fresh

New India Buffet & Bar was very generous to host our Room to Read Destination Dining fundraising event with 100 attendees. The venue was fantastic, the staff was friendly and attentive, and the food was excellent - over 70 dishes!

A splendid place to dine in with friends and family. We went for dinner. Amples of item for Buffet. From starter to main dishes to desserts. Ambience was really nice. Light hindi music on background and you can enjoy cricket/ ice hockey while dine in. Two special items we got that day, yogurt curry and egg curry. Egg curry was really delicious. Same goes for the baked vegetables. They have steamed rice, pilaff/ polao, nun, chow mine etc carb and butter chicken, goat curry and tandoori chicken. You can make your own salad by picking different ingredients and dressings from the counter. As I was driving I did not drink, but believe they have almost everything needed in their bar. Important: they have free parking at their basement which you can access through the rear end of the building. Dietary restrictions: Most of their items are gluten free Parking: they have free parking at their basement which you can access through the rear end of the building.
Best Indian restaurant and also the server Raghav Bhatia was very polite and generous
Delicious food and great customer service. Had warm welcome by Raghav Food
Loved this restaurant a lot, food was very delicious

One of the best curries Ive ever had in Vancouver for a great price. Ordered the butter chicken, naan and rice. So much flavour, spicier than I was expecting which ruled, and the chicken which usually makes or breaks a curry was really high quality!

Ive been here many times for lunch and its always been very good. The food is hot and the salad bar is always fresh. Also a large variety of dishes that would satisfy everyone. Also the curry dishes have lots of meat in them and not just all sauce that Ive had at other restaurants. The service isnt bad from my experience. Ive been seated promptly and water brought to the table right away. They as for drink orders right away. After that Im left to do my thing which I like and its never an issue to wave a server over if I need anything. I find everyone there very friendly and easy going. One of the cooks was putting some food out - she was like a grandmother and had a huge smile on her face. I thanked her so much for the wonderful food
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Sean for your amazing feedback. We will be delighted serve again soon . New India management

reviews.review_text: Well priced, large selection buffet on tho 900 block of Broadway in Vancouver. There are a variety of vegetarian, vegan, gluten-free, and meat options. Ambiance is nice, with Indian music in the background, and friendly, courteous staff.

Great selection of food for both vegetarians and meat lovers. Buffet makes more sense because the cost for an adult to enter the buffet is the same as ordering one Vegetarian options: Theres a whole section dedicated to vegetarian dishes.
Truly Delucious dishes; its taste reminded me of the food served at Indian Royal Weddings. Their Channa Masala and Matar Paneer were scrumptious Vegetarian options: Veg Thaali is super.

Thank God for this place! The butter chicken is heavenly! fresh Naan, variety of vegan food , great service! good salad bar and great deserts! Gluten free options! we always go for the buffet coz its impossible to eat just one thing! Masala tea is mot on the menu but we order every time! and its a must! Thank you New India buffet! we love you! So goooood Vegetarian options: lots of vegan and vegetarian options Dietary restrictions: gluten free, began Parking: free limited parking in the alley behind the restaurant ( belongs to the restaurant)

Dined in here 2 days ago. Food was good. Once you sat, you can use the all the buffet, there are so many meals, appetizers, and Indian tea as well. The bar comes with the fee of course. Servers are helpful (and please don t expect super pro servers in Indian restaurants generally, as normally they re paid less than minimum wage and a very little portion of tip goes to them! They are also fresh!) All in all, it was good service and food
I ve ordered from here a few times now and the quality and taste is unparalleled. Absolutely delicious and fantastic! Hands down one of my favourite restaurants. Great pricing too!

One of the worst places to have indian food. I went there on the basis of google reviews and it seems like all the reviews are fake. Bad food and bad vibe but the most disgusting thing was the staff manners and behaviour towards the customers. I would never recommend this place to anyone.
Delicious food and the server Raghav Bhatia was very nice

Our Server and Dal Makhani I have to say it is the BEST RESTAURANT IN VANCOUVER FOR INDIAN FOOD. Now what makes me say that is first things first the customer service. I would like to Thank Raghav our host/server made our experience a memorable one. After a long rough week we just wanted a warm and cozy meal and Raghav s service made us feel so comfortable. Loved his positive, kind and uplifting attitude. He always had a smile on his face checked up on us and got the most appetizing food straight to us without any delays. He also accommodated my dietary needs without any hesitation. Never ever have we got such an amazing service by a host at any restaurant. Thank you so much Raghav you made our night :) We really appreciate people who go an extra mile and put all their efforts to provide an unforgettable experience. Then i would like to jump onto the 2nd thing that this place is our spot from now onwards because of their DAL MAKHANI IT WAS MOUTHWATERING. Hats off to the chef who made it. When i took that one bite I had tears in my eyes. It was so rich and flavourful, I haven t had such good Dal Makhani in years literally IN YEARS. It was so good both me and my boyfriend were astonished by how good it was. So cozy so warm and so creamy  perfect comfort meal and they have the best butter naans too. Chef s kiss  Can t get over the fact that it was so delicious. Perfect blend of spices and the texture I have to say its a MUST TRY. I am so impressed by my dining experience that I had to write this long review. THE CHEF AND OUR SERVER DESERVES A RAISE  Truly a Luxurious experience :) would recommend 100%
Great place, tasty food. Nice service. Will definitely return.
It s a great cost friendly indian buffet. They  can add more tandoori chicken flavours. Other than that everything tastes so good and servers were also friendly.

I opted for one on one here and received huge amounts of channa masal omg they were delicious , my request here is pls can we order 2 diff dishes for 1on 1 so that we get to taste your 2 things and it compels us to visit your outlet for all if it. Taste 11/10 Quantity 11/10 Packing 10/10

We had an excellent experience here, it was our first time yesterday. The bad reviews dont make any sense lol. This restaurant had perfect buffet selections to my surprise. I eat a lot of this kind of food and have not felt as satisfied as I was with New India Buffet! I could have a little bit of everything I love most at reasonable cost. Spices and ingredients were on point. Friendly helpful staff. We are Vegan so I am very grateful for restaurants that label which selections are suitable for us. There were SO many options and it made our time there a breeze. Cool to see a little salad bar too. I was also pleased with how clean and fancy the atmosphere was inside. Also a great patio for those who wish to sit outdoors. Thanks NIB!   (yesterday was my husbands birthday and we were suppose to go to a different style restaurant but it had a long waiting list. Glad everything worked out the way it did because we got to go here for our first time). Now we dont want to waste time anywhere else!

New India Buffet provided such a pleasant experience for my family and I. I never been to a buffet where the food tasted so fresh. So many dishes to choose from, each and every one of my family members enjoyed the food. The staff was so efficient and kind, always ready making sure everyone was satisfied. I will definitely be making my way back!

When I m craving Indian food, this place is my absolute go to! I m always satisfied after. They re consistent when it comes to food quality and flavour. Not to mention the vibes are always good. I m always greeted by friendly staff and the owner makes a special effort to make sure you feel at home. Highly recommend!
Natural connections make the difference. Kudos Raghav for being awesome attendant
Great experience , decent place to eat. Dine-in and takeout available.
We went for lunch but it was so good we had to go back for dinner. I would definitely recommend this to anyone looking for great Indian food with ample buffet choices.

Great Indian buffet cose to downtown Vancouver. With more than 70 items you are more than likely able to find something you like. $15 pitchers of beer and $24 for all you can eat curries, meats and treats. Always a good time at new India buffet. Staff are friendly and helpful and I will be going again soon.
Great meat and veggie selections. Recommend the buffet since one dish costs the same as an adult to enter the buffet. Vegetarian options: Many vegetarian options. Great place if youre vegetarian.
Best Indian food ! Order off the menu if you want your food more fresh! Butter chicken and shai paneer sooo good. They have the best naan I ve had honestly

Wow fresh cooked. Tasty food with flavors so good you will take a plate home. Some of the best late night desi food we have had in a while. All food was fresh made and we were able to do grocery shopping while we waited (the menu lets your order your grocery) Vegetarian options: Very LARGE  variety! Dietary restrictions: Freshly made, can substitute or you have so many other options Parking: Yes, has its own parking lunder the side entrance. Kid-friendliness: Yes, has a few family friendly booths and high tops Wheelchair accessibility: Yes, Ramp on front door

My dad and I really enjoy coming here all the time, the food is so good and the atmosphere is quite welcoming! The staff never get tired of us lol (we are regulars)! I absolutely love coming here once a month and sometimes twice a week. Food is great 10/10!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank You for the positive feedback. New India management

reviews.review_text: This place has never failed to provide the best service and food! Best Indian food in town!!
Lunch buffet is delicious and bountiful! Too many dishes to try but try we did! Everything was super tasty.

My first impression about this place, I just loved food they have in buffet. It s absolutely amazing. Great spread very tastefully made, deserts are a major let down though. Ambiance is amazing. Staff is thankfully smiley except for they are not trained to be at the edge. Basic thing like the moment you enter the restaurant someone from far will ask you to come in and sit. They somehow lacked polished hospitality. Later I also heard owners fighting in restaurant. That s was like super weird. Now all that being said I totally enjoyed eating here because food taste was great, thanks to the cook. Rest everything else I will rate 2star.

Fresh food and taste was really good too, I loved the fries and curry chicken. Staff is so friendly and helpful, They served very well. Neat place and Ambiance  is really nice, does have enough sitting arrangement inside and outside. Thumps up for the place. If you are living or visiting in Vancouver, should visit once. Tried other places as well but this was a really good experience. On my next trip, I am coming again to this place..

I came here last weekend and was very pleasantly surprised by the experience.  The buffet looked amazing, but we opted to get a few other dishes instead from the kitchen which was all very tasty. Samosa platter was amazing Chicken Pakora was very good Peshwari naan was very, very good.  Ive never had it before but I will choose this more often,  Was very nice. Staff was friendly, not too crowded.  The music they had in the restaurant was great as well.
Fist time in an Indian restaurant, it was very good and clean, staff and howner wonderful

Comfortable, clean, spacious, friendly staff. Great buffet with a variety of dishes and labeled for gluten free options. Not sure what items are dairy free. Would definitely go back with family and friends

First time experience in this environment.I came all the way from Port Moody to try it. It is clean, inviting, great variety of different dishes and pretty much authentic and delicious. I highly recommend it. I will come back with my family and friends.

My experience was amazing! Great tasting food and great entertainment! I went on a weekend and saw belly dancers and it made my entire dining experience pretty cool. I m not usually one who finds buffets all that good but this one was great. The food tasted authentic and the lassi was tasty! Coming back soon!
Really love the food   and great price and Ambiance

Food is better than amazing! I only had stomach space for 43 different menu items, all were very tasty! This place is super clean, and they follow covid protocols very well.  I dont understand how anyone can rate this less than 5 stars. PS I ate until I hated myself.

Was my first at this Restaurant last night. The food was so delicious and the service was incredibly fast .  The owner Tony was super accommodating . Excellent service, incredible staff. Definitely coming back.

One of the BEST. 1. So many dishes with different spices. 2. The dishes are very carefully sliced. At first as trying the restuarant,  I think the taste was not enough.  After thee trys, the taste is PERFECT for each dishes. WOW. 3. The restaurants hours EXCELLENT. There are many greatness in the restaurant. I just commented the first three Goodness. The service are 5 to to 5. Not like some, 0 to 5 in downtown.
